name: Blocks Attack Demo
description:
Year 3020, some stellar bodies has appeared around the Solar System all of a sudden. Recent studies reveal those are a menace for human live, join the colonel Truman in his mission to defeat the thread.

A classic arcade retro game but with nowadays graphics and visual effects. Simple game mechanics. This game is all about blocks, different types of them, basic Blocks, moving Blocks, items Blocks, key Blocks etc.

This is a demo with limited stages to play, the Full game will count with a total of 90 Stages and 9 Bosses to defeat. What are you waiting for? Give it a try and leave a comment.

Note. Only playable on computer browser non mobile device.
